thread.title: The best boutique hotel in Manhattan
thread.title_full: The best boutique hotel in Manhattan - Review of The Roger, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: allisonmS8020YN
title: The best boutique hotel in Manhattan
text: Whenever I'm in NYC for business or just for fun, I always try to stay at the Roger. As a hotel it's nice, clean, attractive and has everything I need. It also has a very neighborhood feel and it's like I'm (still) living in the city. The staff are always friendly and accommodating, and it's quiet!
